transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Hanji sir sorry wo call disconnect ho gaya tha network ki wajah se.
Customer: Mera kehna hai ki mai abhi IndiaMART se itna pareshan ho chuka hu na, koi agar naam bhi leta hai na IndiaMART ka madam to bhi mere ko gali dene ko man hota hai. Itna mere ko pareshan kiya IndiaMART ne. To filhal mere ko koi control calling ka kaam nahi karna hai, kuch nahi karna hai, mere ko bas khali ek hi help chahiye. 
Executive: I am really apologies sir agar aapko. 
Customer: Meri baat suniye aapka policy mere ko nahi sunna hai madam, mere ko bahut logo ne aapka policy suna diya. Aapka policy aapke paas rakhiye. Aapka policy me aapko aise bol de ki hum log kisi ko refund nahi karte, humne proof de diya. To waha pe aapka company galat sabit hua hai. To aap policy ka mere ko to samjhaiye mat. Policy kya hota hai. 
Executive: Sir mai aapko policy nahi bol rahi hu, apologies bol rahi hu sir sorry bol rahi hu ki agar aapko kuch bhi problem hui hai. 
Customer: Dekho mai aapko sorry bolta hu but mujhe khali ek hi chahiye, mere ko ye package nahi chahiye, mujhe uska jitna ho sake utna refund chahiye. Bas mera yahi. 
Executive: Sir mai aapko kaam kara du aur usme kuch return. 
Customer: Nahi karna hai madam, dekhiye meri baat suniye, mera do hath aur teesra sir, mere ko IndiaMART se ek rupaye ka business nahi chahiye madam. Mere paas already 2000 customer hai, mera 300 crore ka turnover hai aur mere ko jyada dhandha nahi chahiye.
Executive: Sir dekho bahut achchi baat hai aapka business. 
Customer: Aur mere ko isse jyada itna jyada dhandha nahi chahiye jaise taki mera tension badhe. Barabar aur mere ko jyada dhandha nahi chahiye kyuki itna magajmari me aapke sath nahi to aapke jaise IndiaMART se customer ka phone aayega uske sath itna magajmari karne ke liye mere paas time nahi hai.
Executive: Sir. 
Customer: Barabar ek hi concern ke liye itna itna phone meri baat suniye, meri baat suniye. Ek hi point ke liye 10-10 aadmi phone karte hai, 10-10, 15-15, 20-20 minute ka hamara time le jata hai. Isme hamara call waiting ho jata hai. Aap logo ya to ek ek cheez hona chahiye madam, yes ya no hona chahiye. Barabar ya to aap ek commitment kar dijiye ki ha hamara bhai customer ko bewakoof banane ka dhandha hai. Aap customer ko support nahi karte hum log paisa ho jane ke baad. Barabar ek ek hi cheez hai madam ye fact hai. Barabar ye lambi lambi chaudi chaudi kahani banane ke baat karne ka koi matlab nahi banta hai.
Executive: Sir agar aisa hota aap hi ke aas paas ki company is in control hai, Kuddam Corporation hai, Sai Control System hai, Micry Instrument hai aur aapki Link Power Technology hai, Power Tech Instrument hai, White Technology hai. Ye sab mai wo customer bata rahi hu sir jo hamari premium services use kar rahe hai aur koi bhi company 7 saal se upar hamare sath hai sir.
Customer: Meri baat suniye, meri baat suno, aap jitne bhi naam diye na Link Park. 
Executive: Ji. 
Customer: Wo premium service kyu leta hai madam? Kyuki uske paas premium product hai. Bole to wo India me uske alawa do hi ya teen hi person jo hai sale karne wale hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Barabar to wo log premium service lete hai. Mere jaise hai na yaha pe line me khade hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aap samajh rahe ho? Aur mere paas jitni bhi meri baat suniye, meri baat aap jo naam de rahe ho na uske regarding me bol raha hu. Hmm. Barabar abhi aapka jaise aapka product hai to aapke product dene wale abhi filhal aapki jaise service dene wale honge do ya teen hi person honge na. Hmm ji.
Customer: Barabar jaise IndiaMART ho gaya, Trade India ho gaya, Exporter India ho gaya. Do teen hi hai na naam. Barabar abhi aise multiple aise service dene wale aa jayenge to aapka kaise chalega?
Customer: Aapko kuch naya launch karna padega na.
Executive: Sir naya launch karna padega ya quality aapki achchi hai ya fir aapki monopoly hai market me to buyer aap hi ke paas aayega sir.
Customer: Nahi wahi to mera kehna hai na madam, aap jitne bhi naam diye na uske paas khud ki OEM wo log khud OEM hai. Unki jaisi product nahi to koi dusra banata hai nahi to koi dusra sale karta hai. Barabar to wo logo ke paas malum hai wo to wo IndiaMART ko chhodo wo to direct Google ko bhi website bana ke padega na to bhi uske paas hi jayega.
Executive: Sir jab pata hi hai unki monopoly hai unko log waise bhi jaante hai to permission ki utni requirement unko developing company ko hai na.
Customer: Madam dekhiye madam meri baat suniye. Itna lambi bahasbaji ka koi matlab nahi hai aap log ko samajh wo wo waha tak ki knowledge ka aapko khyal hi nahi hai ki jisko OEM kya bolte hai, trader kya bolte hai, supplier kisko bolte hai wo log aapko wo log wo cheezo ka aapko idea nahi hai. Barabar wo jab tak samajh me nahi aayega na tab tak ye bahasbaji chalegi. Usse better then mera ek hi aapke request hai aap mera ye na aap baki baat chhodo mere ko kuch nahi samajhna hai mere ko mera refund chahiye.
Executive: Sir dekhiye mai aapko ek cheez batane batane ki koshish kar rahi hu. 
Customer: Mere ko dusra kuch mat batana mere ko aap isse refund refund meri baat suniye meri baat meri baat. 
Executive: Agar aap services use kar rahe hote. 
Customer: Meri baat suniye madam. 
Executive: Nahi aata mai fir bhi man leti aap services use nahi kar rahe ho sir. 
Customer: Meri baat suniye madam. 
Executive: Hanji. 
Customer: Service kya use karu madam kitna complaint karne ke baad agar aap complaint ka solution nahi dete ho to hame service. 
Executive: Premium service le lo aur mahine me na ek ya do bar connect karoge na sir to kisi se fayda nahi aayega aur dekhiye refund policy agar mai mera platform aapke liye inquiry generate na kar pata ya aapke product line me hamare paas inquiry nahi hoti to we can assure you refund but sir agar aap koi service le rakhi hai aapne usme sufficient buyer hai sufficient business hai but aap use use nahi kar rahe ho. Sir ye dekho aap koi premium service gadi kuch bhi le lo aap use utilize hi nahi kar rahe. 
Customer: Madam ek kam karo aap clear clear aap clear bol do ki sir nahi hoga to mai call chhod du kyuki mera call waiting ja raha hai.
Executive: Refund nahi possible ho sakta hai sir. Agar hota to mai aapko hum aapko bata dete sir aap accept kar lijiye ki IndiaMART customer ko totally fake banata hai customer.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund for the package.

- Customer is not getting business from IndiaMART.

- Customer is getting too many calls.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the refund policy.

- Executive mentioned that refund is not possible.



Next Steps: 

None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, business, customer support
